text: Hi there!
Hello, how are you?
I'm doing pretty well. How about yourself?
I'm doing well too
Awesome. Do you know a lot about donating to charities?
Not too much, can you tell me more?

Definitely. There's a children's charity called Save the Children that promotes children's rights, provides relief, and helps support children in developing countries. Have you heard about them, or anything similar?
I have heard of them, do the donations go directly to the children?
They go towards helping the organization ensure children's rights to health, education, and safety.
For children in the United States?
Both children in the US and in developing countries!
Oh have they been around for awhile?
Yes! Actually, they've been around since the 1920's. They started by advocating for the rights of children.
That's a very important cause
It's pretty incredible. Have you thought about donating? Even just the money you make doing this here can impact children all over the world.
I don't think i'd like to donate today.
You sure? You can donate any amount. Even just $.50! The donations I've made have really given my life meaning, knowing I've made an impact on others.
Money is kind of tight right now
I totally understand. Money is something I think we can all relate to. I'm sorry to hear things are tight right now, too. That can be extremely stressful.
Thank you for your understanding

Of course! I like to think of doing something like this a good use of my time (especially since I'm tight on money too) and I like to use it toward donations occasionally so I still know I'm making a difference.
That's nice of you
What do you think of doing something like that?
I'm not making a donation at this time
